alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 12 at 2:28PM CDT until July 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, The creek remains within its banks in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is expected to fall. - Action stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 230 AM CDT.
